title: Manahathites
html: MANAHATHITES(Man·a·haʹthites) [Of (Belonging to) Manahath].Certain Judeans descended from Caleb and Salma who apparently constituted part of the population of Manahath. (1Ch 2:50, 51, 54; 8:6) The Manahathites may be the same as the Menuhoth mentioned at 1 Chronicles 2:52.
